name: Online Payments for WooCommerce
author: wenqy

sections.description:
Your online store must use WooCommerce platform (free wordpress plugin).
Once you installed and activated WooCommerce, you may install and activate Online Payments for WooCommerce.

Features for free Version:

  • If payment completed,will automatically redirect to myaccount recevied page
  • Support pay again with pending orders
  • Supporting refund.
  • Need contact us wen.qy@qq.com
  • Perfect compatibility with WooCommerce
  • Online union Pay payment gateway added into WooCommerce
  • Currency conversion with manual setting of exchange rate
  • Supporting refund
  • Suitable for any WooCommerce theme
  • Demo site：http://www.wenqy.com/
  • WooCommerce子插件，完美兼容
  • 在WooCommerce添加银联支付网关
  • 支持汇率换算，需要手动设置汇率
  • 退款功能
  • 适合任意WooCommerce主题
  • 演示站点：http://www.wenqy.com/
  • 帮助文档：http://www.wenqy.com/

GitHub:

  • Project url in GitHub: https://github.com/wenqy/online-payments-for-woocommerce

Donation:

  • If this plugin really benefits you,Please give me five star high praise

Support Mail:

  • Mailbox: wen.qy@qq.com

Remove plugin

  1. Deactivate plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  2. Delete plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.installation:
1. Install WooCommerce plugin and configure your store (if you haven’t done so already – https://wordpress.org/plugins/woocommerce/).
  2. Install “Online for WooCommerce” wordpress plugin just like any other WordPress plugin.
  3. Activate.
  4. Setup your merchant id, key, throuth Woocommerce -> Settings -> Payment Gateways -> OnlinePay.
    You can apply online payment through https://open.union.qq.com
  5. If the main currency of your store is not Chinese Yuan, please also set the exchange rate so that Online can convert the price to Chinese Yuan.
  6. Help documentation:http://wenqy.com
sections.faq:
1. Q:支持退款吗？A:支持，采用curl方式，服务器没有拦截银联网关
  2. More questions please send a message to wen.qy@qq.com consulting
  3. 怎么使用？安装前需要将银联在线支付的公钥、私钥证书放到插件的certs目录下

Installation Instructions

  1. Install WooCommerce plugin and configure your store (if you haven’t done so already – https://wordpress.org/plugins/woocommerce/).
  2. Install “Online for WooCommerce” wordpress plugin just like any other WordPress plugin.
  3. Activate.
  4. Setup your merchant id, key, throuth Woocommerce -> Settings -> Payment Gateways -> OnlinePay.
    You can apply online payment through https://open.union.qq.com
  5. If the main currency of your store is not Chinese Yuan, please also set the exchange rate so that Online can convert the price to Chinese Yuan.
  6. Help documentation:http://wenqy.com

short_description: Online Payments for WooCommerce is a Wordpress plugin that allows to accept payments at WooCommerce-powered online stores.
